name: LossFunction-DL2
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t DL2Loss -o LossFunction-DL2.json --network f:NO_FILE --network g:NO_FILE

name: LossFunction-Godel
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t GodelLoss -o LossFunction-Godel.json --network f:NO_FILE --network g:NO_FILE

name: LossFunction-Lukasiewicz
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t LukasiewiczLoss -o LossFunction-Lukasiewicz.json --network f:NO_FILE --network g:NO_FILE

name: LossFunction-Yager
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t YagerLoss -o LossFunction-Yager.json --network f:NO_FILE --network g:NO_FILE

name: LossFunction-Product
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t ProductLoss -o LossFunction-Product.json --network f:NO_FILE --network g:NO_FILE
